full_summary:
**TeamTrack Maintenance and Support for CIHR**
### Request for Proposal

#### Notice Type and Solicitation Number BSP
Information has been provided for a Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation by Shared Services Canada. To obtain a copy of the RFP, register at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/91](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/91)

#### Contract Title and Description
This RFP is for the procurement of TeamTrack maintenance and support services for the Canada Institutes of Health Research (CIHR) organization. Peak-volume Task campaign functionalities will be included.

#### Solicitation Details
- **Reference Number**: SSC-24-00025905:T
- **Publication Date**: March 4, 2024
- **Closing Date**: March 16, 2024 (14:00:00 EST)
- **Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Procurement Category**: *GD
- **Trade Agreements**: *None
- **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada

#### Bidder and Contact Information
Bidders can register and download the solicitation document in the SSC P2P portal to submit their proposal. Contact details for bidder inquiries can be found as follows:
Address: [180 Kent Ottawa](http://g.co/maps/m4gpd)
- **City/Province/Country**: Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
- **Postal Code**: K1P 0B6
- **Phone**: (343) 553 8354
- **Fax**: (343) 553 8354

- Version française 
**Entretien et support de TeamTrack pour l'IRSC**
### Demande de propositions

#### Type de demande et numéro de proposition BSP
S'il vous plaît, notez que des informations de proposition ont été fournies par Services partagés Canada. Pour obtenir une copie de la proposition, inscrivez-vous sur [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/91](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/91) pour vous loguer.
